channel.title: Delta Help
channel.description:
NOTE: I know this is client sided! BUT, I posted 6 hours ago and only 5 views!!
Okay, in my client all of the water looks like lava! But, if I use another client, it is water again. But, I was wondering how would I change it from the lava back to regular water.
Please help!

item.title: Delta Help
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Okay, I did that and it worked until the water sprite. When I open the water sprite, it looks like water. :\

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Help
item.description:
@411 wrote:

I think you need to use tom’s cache editor for that. Search for it on google. After you download it, open it and load the cache from you’re client and click the 'View/Edit floor configuration". Look for the water sprite, and change it. To change it click on the water sprite, and on the right you should see something with 2 dots or something like that. click it, and it should let you edit the color.

Read full topic
